rows.label: qev050101_MSG0001
rows.name:
Hmm. I have seen you before. You carry yourself
with the air of a master.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0002
rows.name: Ah! I remember![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0003
rows.name:
Might your name be [ST:playername ]?
The human who bested Prince Jiarg?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_JNK0010
rows.name: Acknowledge

rows.label: qev050101_SEL0011
rows.name: Confirm Go Belg's suspicions.

rows.label: qev050101_JNK0020
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev050101_SEL0021
rows.name:
Stay wary of Go Belg's intentions
and say that he is mistaken.

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0004
rows.name:
I knew it. Though my body may have aged,
my eyes remain keen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0005
rows.name:
This is perfect. I am sure I can finally know peace if
I entrust my dream to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0006
rows.name: Ha ha! Do not be modest, human.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0007
rows.name:
Your feats earned you great fame among Wrothians.
I know your face as well as my own.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0008
rows.name:
I am called Go Belg. Though I am now retired, I was a
fighter of some repute back on our homeworld.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0009
rows.name: I now spend my days training the next generation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0010
rows.name:
Ours is a warrior race. Though we may face poverty
or hunger, that pride and culture must never be
allowed to perish.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0011
rows.name: Will you show me your strength, fellow warrior?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0012
rows.name:
My ancestral armaments and a modest sum await you
when you complete this task. What say you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0013
rows.name:
My thanks. First, I would beg a simple demonstration of
your skill—an indigen hunt.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0014
rows.name:
Your target is a creature called the welkin levitath.
I wish for you to slay two of them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0015
rows.name: I hear they make Primordia their home.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0016
rows.name: I will wait here for word of your victory.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0017
rows.name:
Your target is two welkin levitath.
Go forth to Primordia and strike them down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0018
rows.name:
...The longer I look upon your body, the more it seems
a great wonder.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0019
rows.name:
For such power to be held within so slight a frame
is quite amazing. It is clear you have weathered
countless battles.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0020
rows.name: The two welkin levitath are defeated? Very good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0021
rows.name:
Those beasts resemble the ones Wrothians hunted when
coming of age on our home planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0022
rows.name:
They seemed fine opponents to gauge your skill as a
warrior.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_JNK0110
rows.name: Boast

rows.label: qev050101_SEL0111
rows.name: Claim that it was hardly a challenge.

rows.label: qev050101_JNK0120
rows.name: Grumble

rows.label: qev050101_SEL0121
rows.name: Complain that Wrothian customs are brutal.

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0023
rows.name: I see you have mettle to match your skill.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0024
rows.name:
I like it! I would welcome one of your caliber as my
third pupil.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0025
rows.name:
And yet you defeated the beast nonetheless.
It was a fine hunt.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0026
rows.name:
But now is time for the true test.
I would have you challenge my pupils.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0027
rows.name:
Two Wrothian males by the names of Gi Ziordo and
Gi Ziorde.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0028
rows.name:
They are skilled warriors both, and all the more
formidable when fighting as a pair.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0029
rows.name:
But of late that power has made them proud.
They have parted ways to train alone, no longer
seeing the need for one another's aid.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0030
rows.name:
At this rate, I fear they will lose sight of their true
potential and end life as mediocre talents.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0031
rows.name:
Therefore, I would ask your assistance in beating the
sense back into them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0032
rows.name: Gi Ziordo is at King's Falls in Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0033
rows.name: And Gi Ziorde is in Sylvalum, at the second Anvil Rock.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0034
rows.name: I leave the matter to you. You can find me here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0035
rows.name:
My pupils once urged each other on as brothers would.
And as rivals, they spurred one another to greatness.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0056
rows.name:
But somewhere they lost sight of that and came to trust
only in their own strength.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0036
rows.name: Gi Ziordo is at King's Falls in Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0037
rows.name: And Gi Ziorde is in Sylvalum, at the second Anvil Rock.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0038
rows.name:
I ask that you use your strength to beat the sense back
into them both.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0040
rows.name: You return at last! Good. I grew weary of waiting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0041
rows.name: And? Were my pupils able to land a blow?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_JNK0030
rows.name: Boast

rows.label: qev050101_SEL0031
rows.name: Puff out your chest as if to say it was an easy win.

rows.label: qev050101_JNK0040
rows.name: Reel

rows.label: qev050101_SEL0041
rows.name: Make a show of surrender and marvel at their strength.

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0042
rows.name: So they were a mere warm-up for you...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0043
rows.name:
All the more reason I was right to scout you.
For even your proud tongue serves as proof of your
strength and skill.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0044
rows.name:
I see. Well, proud fools or no, they are warriors I
trained with loving care.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0045
rows.name:
I would hope that even a veteran such as you would
struggle against them—at least a little.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0046
rows.name:
But this is all good news. Losing to you seems to have
shown them that the path to mastery is one they will
have to walk together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0047
rows.name:
Both returned to me separately to take stock of
themselves, and I sent them on to the Outfitters test
hangar in New LA's administrative district.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0048
rows.name:
The moment they see each other, I expect it will be as
if no time has passed at all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0049
rows.name:
Which brings me to my final request.
I would ask that you spar with my pupils once more,
but this time as a pair.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0050
rows.name: It will be their first fight together in some time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0051
rows.name:
Go and test the measure of their bond.
That should be well within your ability.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0072
rows.name:
When Gi Ziordo and Gi Ziorde fight side by side,
their strength is magnified tenfold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0073
rows.name:
Or so it was when last they fought as one.
Please go see whether that bond exists still.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0074
rows.name:
You have returned! And from the looks of it,
it was a fierce battle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0075
rows.name:
What do you think? Were my pupils able to hold trust
in one another and draw forth a power greater than
their own?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_JNK0050
rows.name: Confirm[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_SEL0051
rows.name: Say that they were like entirely different fighters.

rows.label: qev050101_JNK0060
rows.name: Deny[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_SEL0061
rows.name: Claim that they still have a long way to go.

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0052
rows.name: If a warrior of your skill says so, I have no doubt.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0053
rows.name:
From your vantage, it must seem that way.
But I have looked into their eyes since they returned,
and they shine clear and true.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0054
rows.name:
Heh. This time my pupils departed on a journey to
train together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0055
rows.name:
I doubt they will lose their way again. Competition
between them will hone their edges into fine blades.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0058
rows.name: I thank you for using your strength to guide them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050101_MSG0057
rows.name:
This is an old teacher's humble thanks.
It would please me for you to have it.[ST:wait ]
